Name: Nightshift Legacy: The Jaguar's Eye™
About the game: Nightshift Legacy takes you on a historical adventure full of romance and intrigue with The Nightshift Code heroes, Mike and Isabel. You'll travel from the jungles of Guatemala to the streets of Moscow, from present day back to the history of the Spanish Civil War, brush elbows with historical luminaries such as Frida Kahlo and Diego Rivera while hunting for stolen artifacts across multiple continents. Can you find the mysterious Jaguar's Eye before it's too late? A new rich and exciting story featuring 6 full chapters with 7 or more levels each! More fun and witty interactions with and between the main characters Mike and Isabel Over 20 unique search locations from around the globe All New Puzzles Sequel to Nightshift Code's
